author: rbb
msg: Fix our installation.  We need to install APRVARS and all the MM stuff.

author: wrowe
msg: Replace the very limited-use ap_send_size with apr_strfsize(), which
works within a fixed buffer.  I'm open to using the old ap_send_size()
text formatting, but this result is one character shorter in size

author: trawick
msg: fix some issues with apr_sendfile() for FreeBSD
it checked errno without checking rv
it required that we already sent bytes (nbytes != 0)
it checked timeout != 0 instead of timeout > 0
2) it didn't retry the sendfile() (or writev()) after

author: wrowe
msg: Another bit of MSVC bogusness.  Has to argue signedness with us, even
though MIN_SIZE is a const value :(

author: wrowe
msg: Yes, this is a bogus cast.  It's necessary since win32 figures out the
same calculation in apr_ltoa() is safe, but can't figure this out for
